title: Artificial Intelligence In 5 Minutes | What Is Artificial Intelligence? | AI Explained | Simplilearn
excerpt: This video on Artificial Intelligence introduces you to Artificial intelligence with a fun and simple approach. We will talk about what is Artificial Intelligence, how it's different from Machine Learning and deep learning, its features, types, and scope. We also look at some interesting applications
